message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $15,000. What are your thoughts?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope this revised offer meets your consideration.
Thanks for your counter-offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $15,000 is too high.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I would like to propose a price closer to my budget. Would $12,000 be acceptable?
